description: A 5-minute talk to discuss how I've used Quarto and Bootstrap variables to quickly make Shiny's new website look as it should. The Quarto user I have in mind works at an organization with specific brand guidelines to follow. I‚ will discuss how to set up your theme, show some key Quarto settings, and how Bootstrap‚ Sass variables are your best friend.
title: Quickly get your Quarto HTML theme in order
